description.ko: KURO-X가 날카로운 기하학적 형상과 강렬한 시각적 왜곡을 통해 나타나는 디지털 불안정성에 대한 탐구로, 정교한 구조와 혼돈스러운 데이터 오류를 결합한 비주얼입니다.
description.en: An exploration of digital instability where KURO-X manifests through sharp geometric shapes and vibrant visual distortions, blending structured design with chaotic data errors.

prompt: KURO-X cinematic mecha silhouette, geometric glitch art style, fragmented polygonal shards, digital artifacting, chromatic aberration, neon cyan and deep violet accents, sharp edges, data corruption aesthetic, high-tech abstract background, 8k resolution, hyper-detailed, sharp focus.
